name: Sweet Kush
description: Sweet Kush is the potent daughter of Sweet Tooth and OG Kush. Citrusy and sweet, Sweet Kush tastes just like a lemon drop candy. Combining the best of both cannabis types, this hybrid provides both head and body effects. After the first taste, consumers typically experience a cerebral sensation. A few minutes later, body effects begin to dominate, relaxing muscles and easing pain. Sweet Kush consumers may feel lazy and sedated, making this a good after work or nighttime strain. Novice cannabis consumers should exercise caution with this strain until they know how strongly it will affect them.
attributes_title: Happy, Relaxed, Hungry, Sleepy, Euphoric, Stress, Insomnia, Depression, Pain, Headaches, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Paranoid, Headache
